rules.name: Is during Round?
rules.description: If the event happened during the round

rules.name: Is Teamkill?
rules.description: If the attacker killed a teammate

rules.name: Is Selfkill?
rules.description: If the attacker killed himself

rules.name: Attacker Name
rules.description: The name of the attacker

rules.name: Attacker is Bot?
rules.description: If the attacker is a bot

rules.name: Attacker Team
rules.description: The team name of the attacker

rules.name: Victim Name
rules.description: The name of the victim

rules.name: Victim is Bot?
rules.description: If the victim is a bot

rules.name: Victim Team
rules.description: The team name of the victim

rules.name: Assisted Flash?
rules.description: If the victim was flashed by the assistent

rules.name: Attacker is blind?
rules.description: If the attacker was blind

rules.name: Attacker in the air?
rules.description: If the attacker was in the air

rules.name: Distance to victim
rules.description: The distance between the attacker and the victim

rules.name: Damage to Armor
rules.description: The damage dealt to the armor of the victim

rules.name: Damage to Health
rules.description: The damage dealt to the health of the victim

rules.name: Attacker dominated victim?
rules.description: If the attacker dominated the victim

rules.name: Headshot?
rules.description: If the attacker killed the victim with a headshot

rules.name: Hitgroup
rules.description: The hitgroup where the victim got hit

rules.name: Noscope?
rules.description: If the attacker killed the victim without scoping

rules.name: Penetrated?
rules.description: If the attacker's bullet penetrated the victim

rules.name: Revenge?
rules.description: If the attacker killed the victim as a revenge

rules.name: Through Smoke?
rules.description: If the attacker killed the victim through smoke

rules.name: Weapon Name
rules.description: The name of the weapon used by the attacker

rules.name: Weapon Item ID
rules.description: The item id of the weapon used by the attacker
